titleStmt.title: Merry dialogue betwixt a married man and his wife concerning the affaires of this carefull life to an excellent tune.

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Broadside, printed as single sheet, cut and cropped with loss of print.
Right half of sheet contains "The second part. To the same tune," and imprint.
Reproduction of original in: Pepys Library.
